UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antifungal Activity and Action Mechanism of Histatin 5-Halocidin Hybrid Peptides against Candida ssp.
Literature.Author: Han J, Jyoti MA, Song HY, Jang WS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Candida albicans CCARM 14020(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Candida albicans CCARM 14021(MIC=>32µg/ml),Candida albicans CCARM 14022(MIC=>32µg/ml)
